name: Shoots Mans
description:
Shoots Mans is a project I put together at AIE Adelaide as part of one of my assignments.

While this is a simple demo using Unity's netcode, I decided to take things a little further and try and make the standard netcode a little more robust, with individual IDs assigned to each unique player on the server. 

It has been tested with 8 or so people, and is stable, but Unity's netcode leaves a lot to be desired as far as efficiency is concerned. Otherwise the game is simple and fun to play as the tech demo it is.

If you've got a couple friends, please feel free to download and play a few lives with them, or maybe open a few instances on the same machine to play using localhost!
